price: 31. Sidaas awgeed waxaa nagu dhaboobay Qawlka Rabbigeen, waanu dhadhamin (Cadaabka).
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
